meanings.definition: To express grief or sorrow audibly.
meanings.sent1: She begroaned loudly at the sad news.
meanings.sent2: The old man begroaned when he heard of his friend's passing.
meanings.sent3: The puppy begroaned playfully when it lost its favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: The wind begroaned through the trees on the stormy night.
meanings.sent5: The child's heart begroaned with loneliness as the sun set.

meanings.sent1: He begroaned about having to do his chores.
meanings.sent2: The customer begroaned about the poor service at the restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The cat begroaned dramatically when it saw the empty food bowl.
meanings.sent4: The engine begroaned as the car struggled up the steep hill.
meanings.sent5: The students begroaned in unison when the teacher announced a pop quiz.
